definition: to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, 'she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我怀念过去那些美好的日子，”她动情地补充道。

sentences.english: Miss the emotion that I shed tears of missing.
sentences.chinese: 怀念的情思使我流下思念的泪水。

sentences.english: I like to present myself, I miss our quondam.
sentences.chinese: 我喜懽现在的自己，我怀念过去的我们。
奥汉隆说，这些官员怀念他们的无人机。

sentences.english: Basketball fans miss Magic Johnson 's razzle dazzle in the game.
sentences.chinese: 篮球迷们怀念魔术师强纳生球赛中的花招。

sentences.english: Oppressed and condemned, he was taken away, and who would have thought any more of his destiny?
sentences.chinese: 他受了不义的审判而被除掉，有谁怀念他的命运？

sentences.english: Original oat-fiber flavor is the most memorable nice flavor of loyal customers' taste bud.
sentences.chinese: 原味麦纤是老主顾味蕾中最怀念的好滋味。

sentences.english: I'm often asked what I miss about my old world of lucre and business?
sentences.chinese: 我经常自问关于以前的钱财和生意，我会怀念什么。

sentences.english: He is remembered for his charity work as well as his hotel business.
sentences.chinese: 他的慈善功德像他的酒店事业一样使他为人们所怀念。

sentences.english: He lived alone in the big house with only the memory of his late wife for company.
sentences.chinese: 他只在对亡妻怀念之情的陪伴中独居于那所大屋子里。

sentences.english: Looking at the sculpture "Rose", I suddenly think of the old work, "Motherland".
sentences.chinese: 看着雕塑《玫瑰》，忽然有些怀念《故国》的旧作了。

sentences.english: Forgot today meeting, not again fondly remembers .
sentences.chinese: 忘记今天的见面，莫再怀念。

sentences.english: It is desircould sign up for good schools.
sentences.chinese: 请求好学校是令人怀念的。

sentences.english: I close my eyes and clearly my heart remembers.
sentences.chinese: 我闭上双眼，清晰的感到我的心依旧怀念。

sentences.english: But he found he missed the culture and conveniences of a city and relocated to Burlington.
sentences.chinese: 但他发现他怀念城市的文化和便捷，又搬到了伯灵顿。

definition: to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to commemorate/to recall fondly/to think of the past
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
sad/emotional/sentimental/pathos

sad/downhearted/sentimental/pathos/melancholy
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to think fondly of
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
melancholy/depression
to feel nostalgic/nostalgia
to reflect on/to ponder over/aftertaste
to keep in mind constantly (idiom)
to elapse/to pass away/to die/demise
